title: Council cost cutting prompts Levin woman to turn berm into flower garden
desc: When the council stopped mowing her grass, Louise McCarthy got grumpy - then she got digging.

title: Most flu deaths this century were recorded in 2025, ABS finds
desc: There were more deaths associated with influenza last year than any other year this century, according to the Australia Bureau of Statistics.

title: Mass for Ugandan opposition figure Kizza Besigye reportedly blocked on president's orders
desc: A church service scheduled to honour jailed Ugandan opposition figure Kizza Besigye has been cancelled on the orders of the president, Besigye’s wife said on Monday.

title: House Committee Warns Water Ministry Against Implementing New Projects Amid Stalled Projects.
desc: Speaking during a committee meeting on February 23, the members of parliament (MPs) directed the Ministry to prioritise completion of ongoing and delayed projects.

title: Zanzibar pledges stronger support for nurses, midwives
desc: ZANZIBAR: THE government of Zanzibar has pledged to strengthen the health sector by improving working environment and staff welfare, recognising nurses and midwives as frontline lifesavers.
